name: Trick 'er Treat
description:
Huge Trick 'er Treat Simulator!

This is a solo project I did within 10 days for 2 concurrently running game jam themes:
Halloween - Hackington's Fall Game Jam
HUGE - Replit.com Kajam

Navigate the overworld map to find all the different possible houses for trick or treating. Each house you go to has a way of giving you candy. It's up to you to figure out quickly how to get the candy and get out of there! Some candy has different rarity, which you can use to trade up for LEGENDARY candy! Use the legendary candy in trades with different NPCs to improve your trick or treating skills.

When you're done collecting candy, it's time to go home and dump out your haul! Watch the universe implode as you dump out thousands of candy into a HUGE PILE!

Hand-made in Unity.
